title: Beauty's Beast
description: A Dark RomanceShe'll pay her family's debt one way or another... Daphne’s beautiful, but she doesn’t know it.A wallflower blossoming into the belle of the ball.Years ago her father stole from me and it’s time for my revenge. I’m the monster in the darkness. The Minotaur in the labyrinth. The evil her father warned her about.I’ll steal her away to my castle. Lock her in my tower. Make her mine in every way.She’ll atone for her family’s sins... forever.She’s Beauty, and I’m the Beast. Note: This is a dark romance. It is the first in a trilogy.
author: Lee Savino
